Instruction: Blend in any additions and knead until the dough is smooth and slightly sticky. Cover the bowl and let the dough rise until doubled in size, approximately 90 minutes.

Knead dough on a floured surface for 5 to 8 minutes until thoroughly mixed, yet still slightly sticky. Form dough into a ball and place in an oiled bowl. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 1 hour.
Knead the dough until it forms a smooth ball. Place the dough in an oiled bowl, cover with a cloth, and let it rise until doubled in size, about 1 hour.
Heat the oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit (220 degrees Celsius).
Bake the loaves until golden brown, about 25 minutes. Cut each loaf into 8 wedges to serve.
